nccovid 0.0.2
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Pull Vaccination Rates by County and Demographic

get_vaccinations_demo.Rd

Pulled from <conedatascience/covid-data>. The columns vax_prop and vax_n return the vaccination proportion and vaccination counts.

get_vaccinations_demo(
  county_list = NULL,
  measure = NULL,
  demographic = NULL,
  dose = NULL,
  latest = FALSE
)

Arguments

county_list

a string, the county to pull. default is all counties AND a North Carolina roll up. "North Carolina" can be supplied as a county.
measure

a string, the measure requested. one of "distribution" or "per capita" for pulling the distribution of vaccine (adds to 1 within the demographic) or the vaccinate rate per capita within the demographic, respectively. default is all measures.
demographic

a string, the demographic requested. one or more of "race", "age", "ethnicity", "sex". default is all demographics
dose

integer, the dose to pull (1 or 2). default is all doses.
latest

logical, whether to pull only the latest vaccination record or a full time series. default F pulls full time series

Examples

{

get_vaccinations_demo(county_list = "Guilford", measure = 'distribution',
                      demographic = 'race', dose = 1, latest = TRUE)

}

#>          date aggregation_level   county demographic
